PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryTypeLock
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of locking equipment. The property set can be used by the predefined type LOCK of IfcDiscreteAccessory.

PropertyDef.Name: InstallationPlan
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference to external information source about installation or construction plan of the element.

PropertyDef.Name: RequiredClosureSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Required length of the closure spacing.
